eidolon_edoni.block.curry_pot.use_contai: You need a Bread or Cooked Rice to eat this.
eidolon_edoni.block.roasted_avennian_spr: You need a Stick to eat this.
item.eidolon_edoni.roasted_avennian_spri: Roasted Sprig of Avenna on a Stick
item.eidolon_edoni.stuffed_wither_skelet: Bowl of Stuffed Wither Skeleton Skull
item.eidolon_edoni.all_rounder.lore.dark: The dark lord is pleased and awarded your tool with their §1§oNecrotic§r power.
item.eidolon_edoni.all_rounder.lore.ligh: The light lord is pleased and §6§oBlessed§r your tool with their holy power.
item.eidolon_edoni.all_rounder.lore.bala: Both the deities are pleased well, now your tool has both of their powers as the reward of being a double-dealer.
item.eidolon_edoni.all_rounder.lore.none: None of the deities have noticed you.
lore.eidolon_edoni.chorus_incense: As its scent lingers around as if chorusing, which makes you want to join in.
lore.eidolon_edoni.stimulating_incense: It's fueling a thirst for blood... and also brings wild excitement.
lore.eidolon_edoni.gluttony_incense: Its scent makes you crave a lot.
farmersdelight.tooltip.dark_feed.when_fe: When fed to a tamed undead mount:
When fed to a tamed non-undead mount:
eidolon_edoni.codex.page.rituals.title: Rituals (Edoni)
eidolon_edoni.codex.page.butchery_ritual: The ritual of butchering will slaughter any of the adult animals around the brazier with the knife placed on the focus. To prevent specific animals from being killed, you have to name them with a name tag.
eidolon_edoni.codex.page.artifice.title: Artifice (Edoni)
eidolon_edoni.codex.page.all_rounder: This theurgical utility tool was made from the power of both the lords of dark and light. Upon killing a creature while holding a goblet with it, it will fill the goblet with blood of this creature.
eidolon_edoni.codex.page.all_rounder.1: As you please the deities, they will imbue this tool with their power. Biasing any one of them will cause it loses the power of the other. When your reputation with the deities is truly balanced, you are able to keep their powers simultaneously.
eidolon_edoni.codex.page.spells.title: Spells (Edoni)
eidolon_edoni.codex.page.devour.title: Devour
eidolon_edoni.codex.page.devour: This chant allows you to devour a mob in front of you. Devouring specific mobs will hurt you due to their tough or fiery husks.
The pure nature of flowering oanna also seems to affect the propagation of sound. By mixing it with other resonant matters, its scent creates an ethereal chord, lingering in the air.
Merammer resin also reacts to the smell of certain things and changes them. Scent of rotting foods makes your appetite surge, while aroma of hot soup makes you feel peace and comfort.
While improving bloodlust incense by concentrating it, as it becomes stronger, it'll also make you more vulnerable.
eidolon_edoni.codex.page.rich_soil_plant: You can make a rich soil planter with rich soil and arcane gold. This provides higher growing speed and a better looking!
